articles.title: At least 126 people dead as Europe reels from worst floods in years - SBS News
articles.description: Severe storms have put climate change back at the centre of Germany's election campaign ahead of a September poll marking the end of German Chancellor Angela Merkel Merkel's 16 years in power.

articles.title: Huge floods leave at least 108 dead in Europe - News24
articles.description: The death toll from devastating floods in Europe soared to at least 108 on Friday, most in western Germany where emergency responders were frantically searching for missing people.
